survey_brief: This survey aims to assess patron satisfaction with library services, resources, and facilities to improve user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you visit the library?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button scale for clear single-choice selection. Consider adding 'Not applicable' if needed.

script.question_text: How often do you visit the library?

questions.question_text: What is your primary purpose for visiting the library? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections with checkboxes. Include an 'Other' option with text entry.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: What is your primary purpose for visiting the library? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of books and other materials?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measurable satisfaction data. Consider adding 'N/A' if needed.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of books and other materials?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the cleanliness and maintenance of library facilities?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear ordinal scale for consistent ratings across respondents.

script.question_text: How would you rate the cleanliness and maintenance of library facilities?

questions.question_text: Have you attended any library programs or events in the past year?
questions.client_notes: Simple binary question to filter for event attendees.

script.question_text: Have you attended any library programs or events in the past year?

questions.question_text: If yes, which types of programs have you attended? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Only show if Q5 is 'Yes'. Allow multiple selections.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with conditional routing

script.question_text: If yes, which types of programs have you attended? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the library's digital resources (e-books, online databases, etc.)?
questions.client_notes: Include an opt-out option for non-users of digital resources.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the library's digital resources (e-books, online databases, etc.)?

questions.question_text: How easy is it to find materials using the library catalog?
questions.client_notes: Assess usability of catalog system with a standard scale.

script.question_text: How easy is it to find materials using the library catalog?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the helpfulness of library staff?
questions.client_notes: Standard rating scale for service quality assessment.

script.question_text: How would you rate the helpfulness of library staff?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our library services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text (OPEN_TEXT) with character limit

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our library services?
